# PaperMarkupViewController.TouchMode.selection

**Case**

Select strokes/elements on a canvas.

## Declaration

```swift
case selection
```

## Discussion

`.indirectPointer` touches can marquee select multiple elements when dragging on the canvas.
title: PaperMarkupViewController.TouchMode.selection
